Room.Name: Evenborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Evenborough Way, east of the Evenborough Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The Evenborough Inn provides luxurious accomodations for the weary traveller for either single night visits or prolonged stays in Oceancrest. There is a magnificent fountain in front of the main entrance to the building, suggesting the price of staying here might be a little expensive. The Evenborough Stables are located on the eastern side of the road.
